metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1983 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The client_host function in parsers.c in Privoxy before 3.0.24 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and crash) via an empty HTTP Host header. It was discovered that privoxy has out-of-bound read bug. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1').
